trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Jonquinet requires a sturdy back to assist him.
TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_TODO_00<tab>Plant the experimental seeds at the designated locations.

TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_JONQUINET_000_000<tab>Might you have some time to spare for an old researcher, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>? Physical labor doesn't come to me as easily as it once did, and I'm in search of someone a bit more spry to assist me.

TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_JONQUINET_000_001<tab>The task is a simple one, rest assured. You need only plant these experimental seeds in the nearby fields. You would be compensated for your troubles, of course.
TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_JONQUINET_000_002<tab>No special skills are required of you. If you've planted one seed, you've planted most of them. Well then, I look forward to seeing what you can do.
TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_JONQUINET_000_003<tab>You have the seeds, yes? I expect you know what to do with them. If not, well...I'm afraid we may have more troubling issues at hand.
TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_JONQUINET_000_010<tab>Slightly flushed, are you? Good. I take it that means you've planted the seeds. You have my thanks, and if all goes to plan, the realm's as well.
TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_JONQUINET_000_011<tab>You see, my research involves the production of nutrient-rich plants that can be harvested in greater numbers than any we have seen thus far.
TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_JONQUINET_000_012<tab>However, even the most extraordinary crop is useless if they cannot be planted and raised by the common <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>.

TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_JONQUINET_000_013<tab>I've long made ease of use a priority when I develop new seeds, asking everyone from experienced researchers to eager children to plant them in the earth and then comparing results.

TEXT_AKTKZA013_04192_JONQUINET_000_014<tab>But of course, I'm sure you've had more than enough long-winded explanations over your journeys to last a lifetime. Take this reward for your contribution, and take satisfaction in a job well done.
